←About

Welcome to Team Tool Box, a project to help you build teams or find members randomly!

This tool may be useful for trainers, teachers, managers or anyone else who works with or within groups.

It helps whenever we need to pick someone, don't find volunteers, define teams (practical exercises, collective thinking, etc...) or define passing order.

This site does not retain any of your data. Your data is stored in your browser's local storage. Use remoteStorage by clicking the icon in the top-right corner if you want to synchronize your data across devices.

Developer: This is a sample Single Page Application built with several tiny components, more information and source code here: https://github.com/lduboeuf/team-tool-box

Also, this demonstrates that for little apps, there is no need for big MV* frameworks and complex glue code.
